The first ASML lithography scanner was installed to produce 2nm chips using Low-NA EUV technology Somewhat overlooked in the context of recent advances between Intel and ASML is the fact that chipmakers hope to master 2nm production without switching to the use of more expensive EUV high-numerical aperture (High-NA) scanners. It is expected that this scanner will be able to process about 220 silicon wafers per hour versus the previous 160 pieces, justifying its high price with adequate performance, because the equipment for EUV lithography of the previous generation, to put it mildly, was not very fast.  This equipment, according to AnandTechis characterized by a Low Numerical Aperture (Low-NA) value of 0.33, but compared to the previous generation of ASML lithography scanners, it offers increased productivity and a more reasonable cost compared to high NA scanners. column3: [{'url': 'https://www.globalvillagespace.com/tech/salesforce-introduces-the-pro-suite-to-expand-its-presence-in-the-smb-market/', 'published date': 'Wed, 13 Mar 2024 04:22:05 GMT', 'title': "Salesforce introduces the 'Pro Suite' to expand its presence in the SMB market - Global Village space", 'content': 'Salesforce introduces the ‘Pro Suite’ to expand its presence in the SMB market Salesforce, one of the leading customer relationship management (CRM) companies, is expanding its presence in the small and medium-sized business (SMB) market with the launch of its “Pro Suite” offering. According to Kris Billmaier, SVP and GM of self-service and growth at Salesforce, many customers have already upgraded from the Starter Suite to the Pro Suite due to the need for customization and advanced features. The Pro Suite unlocks additional capabilities across marketing, sales, service, and commerce, as well as access to AppExchange solutions, process automation with Flow, a dedicated sandbox for testing and training, and support for custom apps and objects. With its advanced features, customizable options, and AI capabilities, the Pro Suite provides SMBs with the tools they need to streamline their business workflows and drive growth. While both the Starter and Pro Suites currently offer basic predictive AI features like Einstein Activity Capture and Send Time Optimization, Salesforce plans to introduce more advanced generative AI capabilities with Einstein Copilot in the future.', 'score': 0.7901778221130371}, {'url': 'https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-03-11/oracle-sales-beat-estimates-as-cloud-growth-stabilizes', 'published date': 'Mon, 11 Mar 2024 20:22:37 GMT', 'title': 'Oracle Sales Beat Estimates as Cloud Growth Stabilizes - Bloomberg', 'content': 'Bloomberg Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world For Customers Support Americas+1 212 318 2000 EMEA+44 20 7330 7500 Asia Pacific+65 6212 1000 Company Communications Follow Products Industry Products Media Media Services Company Communications Follow Products Industry Products Media Media Services Bloomberg Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world For Customers Support Americas+1 212 318 2000 EMEA+44 20 7330 7500 Asia Pacific+65 6212 1000 Oracle Jumps as ‘Large’ New Cloud Contracts Spur Revenue Growth Oracle headquarter in Redwood Shores, California.  Oracle Corp. surged 11% after signaling that growth in its closely watched cloud computing business is stabilizing, showing progress in its bid to capture more market share in the competitive market.  Cloud revenue jumped 25% to $5.1 billion in the period that ended in February, the company said Monday in a statementBloomberg Terminal, surpassing Wall Street’s $5.06 billion estimate. While SpaceX waited for the launch license from the FAA, teams continued working on preparing Ship 28 and Booster 10, including installing the Flight Termination System on Ship 10 before it was stacked back on top of Booster 10 for the final time.  The company is still targeting the morning of Thursday, March 14th, while they await the launch license from the Federal Aviation Administration, which could come at any time between now and the evening before launch.  Previous attempts aimed for a splash down North of the Hawaiian Islands, but with IFT-3, SpaceX is aiming for another suborbital trajectory with a splash down just East of Madagascar in the Indian Ocean. ', 'score': 0.7957027554512024}, {'url': 'https://www.globalvillagespace.com/tech/tesla-cybertruck-flipping-threats-a-serious-matter/', 'published date': 'Tue, 12 Mar 2024 17:21:37 GMT', 'title': 'Tesla Cybertruck Flipping Threats: A Serious Matter - Global Village space', 'content': 'Tesla Cybertruck Flipping Threats: A Serious Matter Tesla Cybertruck Flipping Threats: A Serious Matter The highly anticipated Tesla Cybertruck has garnered an impressive number of reservations since its announcement, prompting the American automaker to take strict measures against those attempting to flip the electric pickup truck for a quick profit. As the Cybertruck continues to generate excitement and demand, Tesla’s actions send a clear message that they will not tolerate attempts to exploit their vehicles for personal gain.  In conclusion, Tesla’s crackdown on individuals attempting to flip the Cybertruck for profit demonstrates the automaker’s commitment to protecting genuine buyers. The forum user, known as malinecentral, recounted their encounter with Tesla’s Loss and Prevention team, as well as a store leader, who informed them that their other two truck reservations had been canceled. This firm stance by Tesla reflects their commitment to ensuring that genuine buyers have fair access to their vehicles, without falling victim to opportunistic flippers. column2: Elevate Nvidia's Marketing with Tailored AI Solutions
column3: Transform Your Email Marketing with Salesforce AI
column4: Elevate Tesla's PR with AI-Enhanced Email Personalization
column5: Unlock New Levels of Engagement with AI-Driven Email Personalization

column2:
Dear Terry Reynolds,

I trust this email finds you in good spirits. At Streak, we've been admiring Nvidia's groundbreaking work in AI and technology, recognizing that innovation propels us forward. It's with this spirit of innovation in mind that I'm excited to share a breakthrough that could transform Nvidia's marketing dynamics.

Introducing our advanced AI-driven mass email generator, designed to automate and personalize communication at scale. Unlike conventional tools, ours is engineered to significantly enhance engagement and conversion rates by ensuring each email it sends is uniquely tailored to its recipient, based on sophisticated AI analysis.

Drawing inspiration from Nvidia's trailblazing advancements in AI, as showcased at GTC 2024, our solution seeks to parallel Nvidia's commitment to pushing technological boundaries. We envision our tool not just as a leap forward in digital marketing, but as a partner to Nvidia in redefining how businesses connect with their audiences.

We're confident that Nvidia will find great value in our product, leveraging it to forge deeper, more meaningful connections with your audience through unparalleled personalization.

I'm keen to discuss how our solution can seamlessly integrate with Nvidia's existing marketing strategies to amplify your impact. Could we schedule a time for a brief call next week to dive deeper into potential synergies?

Eagerly anticipating the opportunity to collaborate.

Warm regards,

Omer Nauer
Marketing Strategist at Streak
omer.n99@gmail.com
column3:
Dear Omer Nauer,

I hope you're doing well. I'm excited to share with you a groundbreaking development at Salesforce, one that could revolutionize Streak's email marketing and elevate your campaign personalization to new heights.

Introducing the 'Pro Suite' – specially crafted for the dynamic needs of businesses like Streak. Beyond its customizable features, process automation, and a sandbox environment for testing, the Pro Suite is set to incorporate Einstein Copilot's generative AI, offering unmatched email personalization.

Picture a tool that not only automates your email campaigns but tailors each message with precision, thanks to advanced AI analytics. The Pro Suite is designed to make your communications more impactful, building deeper connections with your audience.

In today's fast-paced digital world, embracing technological innovation is crucial. With the Pro Suite's AI enhancements, Salesforce is at the forefront, helping SMBs achieve remarkable efficiency and growth, as highlighted by Global Village Space.

I believe there's tremendous potential for synergy between Streak and the Pro Suite. By harnessing our AI-driven solutions, your marketing efforts could reach unprecedented levels of personalization and efficiency.

I'd be thrilled to explore how the Pro Suite can benefit Streak in more detail. Could we schedule a call next week to discuss this further? Please let me know your availability, and I'll arrange everything.

Thank you for considering Salesforce as your innovation partner. I'm looking forward to the opportunity to collaborate and transform your email marketing landscape.

Best regards,

Michael Davis
Marketing Coordinator
salesforce.com
michaeld@salesforce.com
column4:
Dear Dr. Logan Sandoval,

I trust this message finds you thriving. As Tesla continues to redefine the future of transportation and renewable energy, the significance of engaging directly and personally with your stakeholders cannot be overstated. With Tesla's recent advancements, including the impressive updates to the FSD Beta and the buzz around Elon Musk's Giga Berlin visit, your leadership in innovation is clear.

In today's rapidly evolving tech landscape, fostering strong customer relationships through effective communication is paramount. Our AI-powered mass email generator is crafted to elevate this aspect for Tesla. By personalizing each email based on comprehensive data analysis, we ensure your communications resonate deeply with each recipient.

Envision distributing press releases, updates, and announcements that feel individually tailored, thereby heightening engagement and solidifying your brand connection. From celebrating new software features, like the adaptive high beams, to navigating challenges and milestones, our tool guarantees your messages are always on point and impactful.

Our platform not only crafts content that aligns with Tesla's vision but also analyzes ongoing trends and insights to keep your messaging relevant and forward-thinking. By integrating our technology, you can revolutionize Tesla's PR approach, making every email a step towards a more connected and sustainable future.

I'm eager to discuss how our solution can be customized to support Tesla's unique aspirations and address your PR challenges. Let's arrange a conversation to explore how we can collaborate to further Tesla's pioneering mission.

Thank you for considering our proposal to innovate your email communications. I look forward to the opportunity to contribute to Tesla's journey.

Warm regards,
Omer Nauer
Streak
omer.n99@gmail.com
column5:
Dear Tina Ross,

I hope this message finds you thriving. At Bloomgberg.com, your role as Brand Manager places you at the forefront of crafting messages that not only reach but truly resonate with your audience. In an era where technology evolves at breakneck speed, embracing innovative solutions is not just an option; it's a necessity.

I'm excited to share with you a groundbreaking tool that embodies the forward-thinking ethos of Bloomgberg.com. Our cutting-edge mass email generator leverages artificial intelligence to craft personalized emails for each recipient. This isn't just about sending emails; it's about starting meaningful conversations.

Drawing inspiration from Bloomberg's coverage on dynamic industries and transformative technologies, our platform is designed for leaders like you who understand the value of staying ahead. It offers a smarter, more adaptive way to connect with your audience, powered by the latest AI technology.

Why should this matter to you? Similar to how Bloomberg connects leaders to crucial insights, our tool ensures your email marketing efforts are precisely targeted and exceptionally effective. It's about making every email a tailored engagement opportunity that speaks directly to the individual's interests and needs.

Imagine the impact of every email you send being a carefully crafted dialogue, designed with the precision and intelligence only AI can offer. In a world where genuine engagement is the currency of success, let us empower you to reach unparalleled levels of connection with your audience.

I'm keen to show you how our solution can elevate Bloomgberg.com's email marketing to new heights. Would you be open to a brief discussion next week to explore this further? Let's take this opportunity to transform your email strategy together.

Warmest regards,

Omer Nauer
Streak
omer.n99@gmail.com

column2: The email has been edited for enhanced personalization and engagement. Firstly, the subject line was refined to directly address Nvidia's potential benefits, making it more appealing. The opening salutation and introduction were tweaked to create a more personal, warm tone. Technical jargon and overly promotional language were minimized to focus on the mutual benefits and shared values in innovation between Streak and Nvidia, aiming to foster a sense of partnership. The call to action was made more direct and inviting, emphasizing the collaborative potential. These changes aim to craft a more compelling, reader-focused email that better aligns with effective marketing communication strategies.
column3: The email has been edited to enhance clarity and engagement. The introduction now directly addresses the recipient with warmth, immediately followed by the highlight of the Pro Suite, emphasizing its relevance to the recipient's business. Technical jargon has been minimized to ensure readability, focusing instead on the benefits and features in a more accessible manner. The invitation for a follow-up call is more inviting, encouraging a dialogue rather than a one-sided proposition. These changes aim to make the email more personal, focused, and compelling, improving the likelihood of a positive response.
column4: The email was revised to enhance its personal touch and relevance to Tesla's achievements and vision. The subject line was refined for clarity and appeal. The content was adjusted to emphasize the benefits of personalized communication and the role of AI in achieving this at scale. Specific examples of Tesla's innovations were kept to underscore the potential impact of personalized emails. The invitation to discuss the product's fit for Tesla was made more direct, aiming to encourage engagement. These changes aim to make the email more engaging and focused on the recipient's needs and achievements.
column5: The email was edited for a more engaging and concise tone, focusing on the benefits of AI-driven personalization in email marketing directly relevant to Tina Ross's role. References to specific Bloomberg articles were removed to generalize the appeal and ensure the message remains focused on the product's benefits rather than external content. The call to action was made more direct, inviting a clear next step. These changes aim to make the email more compelling and relevant, ensuring it captures the recipient's interest more effectively.
